      • render

        public void render()
        Renders all tiles in their position. Calculates the tile position based on the tile width and tile height.

      • walkableTile

        public boolean walkableTile(org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.Entity entity,
                   float dx,
                   float dy,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> allowedTiles)
        Checks if the entity is trying to access a legible tile, by checking against the entity's allowed tiles list. Ghosts can move on the ghost tiles in the center of the screen, but Pacman can't.
        Parameters:
        entity -
        dx -
        dy -
        allowedTiles -
